TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WorkflowRuntimeEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Provides data for the and events.
Gets a value that indicates whether the workflow runtime engine is running.
Docs.value: if the workflow runtime engine is running; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks IsStarted will be `true` for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started?displayProperty=fullName> event and false for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=fullName> event.
